mapper.select: SELECT A.account_id, A.university_code, B.university_name, A.school_id, C.school_name, A.full_name, A.sex, A.birth, A.cellphone, A.email, A.photo, D.admin_name AS create_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, D.admin_name AS update_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM shangshufang_customer.university_customer A INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.university B ON A.university_code = B.university_code INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.school C ON A.university_code = C.university_code AND A.school_id = C.school_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.system_admin D ON A.create_user = D.admin_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.system_admin E ON A.update_user = E.admin_id WHERE A.customer_id = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.cellphone = #{arg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
SELECT COUNT(1) AS TotalCount FROM shangshufang_customer.university_customer WHERE cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
SELECT COUNT(1) AS TotalCount FROM shangshufang_customer.university_customer WHERE email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
